participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and fashion-forward, always striving for the finer things in life.
participant_1.background: my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i often shop for shoes and watches. i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and practical, with a love for animals and a strong sense of duty.
participant_2.background: my father drove a car for nascar. my favorite color is grey. i am employed by the us postal service. i'm terrified of scorpions. i have a german shepherd named barnaby.
